methods.name: switchEthereumChain
methods.rawdescription:
This method is used for switching Metamask network by {@link chainId}.
If Metamask doesn't have this {@link chainId} it can be added by parameter {@link chainParams}.
If you don't have chainId, you can use helper {@link aucConvertChainIdToHex} to generate it. Uses for adding new network to Metamask if it doesn't include network by {@link chainId}.
This Library already have {@link chainParams} for the next chainIds {@link AUC_CHAIN_ID}.
You can use your own specific params.
methods.description:
This method is used for switching Metamask network by {@link chainId}.
If Metamask doesn't have this {@link chainId} it can be added by parameter {@link chainParams}.

If you don't have chainId, you can use helper {@link aucConvertChainIdToHex} to generate it.

Uses for adding new network to Metamask if it doesn't include network by {@link chainId}.
This Library already have {@link chainParams} for the next chainIds {@link AUC_CHAIN_ID}.
You can use your own specific params.

jsdoctags.comment:
• 0x-prefixed hexadecimal string.
    If you don't have chainId, you can use helper {@link aucConvertChainIdToHex} to generate it.

• An optional parameter.
    Uses for adding new network to Metamask if it doesn't include network by {@link chainId}.
    This Library already have {@link chainParams} for the next chainIds {@link AUC_CHAIN_ID}.
    You can use your own specific params.

<auc-button class="auc-transaction-history-btn"
            *ngIf="!(hasFailedTx || hasPendingTx)"
            [color]="COLORS.WHITE"
            [appearance]="BTN_APPEARANCE.ICON"
            leftIcon="wcl-icon-recent"
            (onClick)="onTransactionsClick()"
>
</auc-button>

<auc-button class="auc-transaction-history-btn"
            *ngIf="hasFailedTx && !hasPendingTx"
            [label]="txCount + ' failing'"
            [color]="COLORS.RED"
            rightIcon="wcl-icon-fail"
            (onClick)="onTransactionsClick()"
>
</auc-button>

<auc-button class="auc-transaction-history-btn"
            *ngIf="hasPendingTx"
            [label]="txCount + ' pending'"
            [pending]="true"
            [color]="COLORS.WHITE"
            (onClick)="onTransactionsClick()"
>
</auc-button>
